web_findings.title: Web summary
web_findings.snippet:
# TX20 Pin Security Head Screw Specification Summary

This is a **custom security fastener** with a 6-lobe pin torx drive (TX20) designed for tamper-resistant applications requiring medium security resistance[2][5].

## Key Specifications

| Parameter | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| **Drive Type** | TX20 Pin (6-lobe star with center pin) |
| **Thread Size** | M8 × 1.25 pitch |
| **Overall Length** | 12 mm |
| **Head Height** | 4 mm |
| **Threaded Length** | 8 mm |
| **Material** | Stainless Steel A2 |
| **Finish** | Plain/Natural (no additional coating) |

## Functional Characteristics

**Security Features:** The TX20 pin torx drive provides **medium-level anti-tamper security**, requiring a special pin torx bit for insertion and removal rather than standard torx tools[1]. This design reduces slippage and cam-out compared to Phillips or standard drives, minimizing damage to the drive tip and screw head[2].

**Material Properties:** A2 stainless steel offers corrosion resistance suitable for general-purpose applications[2][5]. The plain finish indicates no additional protective plating (such as Delta Protekt® or zinc coating) is applied[1].

**TX20 Drive Specifications:** According to torx specifications, the TX20 drive has a circumscribed circle diameter (ØA) of 3.94 mm and an incircle diameter (ØB) of 2.83 mm[7].

**Application Suitability:** Pin TX security screws are **2-way reusable fasteners** suitable for applications requiring maintenance access while maintaining tamper resistance[5]. The custom dimensions (particularly the short 12 mm length and 4 mm head height) suggest specialized applications with space constraints.

summary_md:
**1) RFQ Summary**
*   **Customer:** Baba
*   **Title:** Baba 2 - SS Lobe Pin
*   **Product:** M8 Lobe Pin - SS A2
*   **Quantity:** 4000 units or Minimum Order Quantity (MOQ)
*   **Region:** UK
*   **Standard/Compliance:** CE (REQUIRED / TO BE CONFIRMED)

**2) Technical Specifications**
*   **Part Name:** Lobe Pin Security Head Screw
*   **Part Number:** NPD051
*   **Drive Type:** TX20 Pin Security Head (6 Lobe Pin Security Head)
*   **Thread:** M8 x 1.25 pitch
*   **Overall Length:** 12 mm
*   **Head Height:** 4 mm
*   **Threaded Length:** 8 mm (Inferred from Overall Length - Head Height)
*   **Material:** Stainless Steel A2
*   **Finish:** Plain / Natural SS (N/A)
*   **Tolerances (Unless otherwise specified):** +/-0.15 mm
*   **General Requirements:**
    *   All dimensions in millimeters (MM).
    *   Remove all sharp edges.
    *   Debur and break all sharp edges.
*   **TX20 Drive Specifications (Web Reference):**
    *   Circumscribed Circle Diameter (ØA): 3.94 mm
    *   Incircle Diameter (ØB): 2.83 mm

**3) Missing Information & Risks**
*   **Quantity:** Confirmation of exact quantity if MOQ is different from 4000.
*   **Compliance:** Confirmation of CE compliance.
*   **Drawing Revision:** Specific revision number for Lobe Pin.pdf.
*   **Drawing Details:** Project Mach Code, Sheet number, Designed By, Checked By.
*   **Packaging:** Specific packaging requirements.
*   **Delivery:** Required delivery schedule.
*   **Pricing:** Target pricing or budget.

**4) Evidence Notes**
*   **RFQ JSON:** Customer, Title, Product Name, Quantity, Region, Standard/Compliance, Initial dimensions, Material.
*   **Lobe Pin.pdf:** Part Number (NPD051), TX20 6 Lobe Pin Security Head, 4mm (Head Height), 12mm (Overall Length), M8x1.25 Thread, Stainless Steel A2, Finish N/A, All dimensions in MM, Remove all sharp edges, Tolerances +/-0.15mm, Debur and break all sharp edges.
*   **RFQ-SS Lobe Pin.xlsx:** No specific technical specifications extracted from the provided summary.

**Web references used:**
*   https://www.fastenright.com/security-fasteners/6-lobe-pin-tx-pan-thread-forming-security-screw/tx20 (for TX20 drive specifications and functional characteristics)
